EmailTemplate.name: Corp Comm.WWSKO Reminder 2-10
EmailTemplate.subject: Attend a Live Webcast from the Pivotal Worldwide Sales Kickoff in Monterey
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
WWSKO 2014 Pivotal's first ever Worldwide Sales Kickoff is this week in Monterey. We are inviting the entire company to join us for the opening General Session to hear keynotes from:
- Paul Maritz, CEO, Pivotal - Scott Yara, President and Head of Products, Pivotal - Scott Aronson, Senior Vice President, Global Field Operations, Pivotal - Joe Tucci, Chairman and CEO, EMC
You can join the webcast by visiting here <http://webcastevent.com/events/pivotal/WWSKO/> using the password DeerCreek. Regards, David Oro Senior Director, Corporate Communications WWSKO TUESDAY FEBRUARY 11, 2014 8:00 - 9:00AM PST Password: DeerCreek JOIN NOW <http://webcastevent.com/events/pivotal/WWSKO/>
